name: Slippery Slope
description:
A game for one or two players. One Player
  1. Draw lines with your mouse, but watch your ink levels.
  2. Control the player with WASD or Arrows.
  3. Avoid obstacles and reach the exit.
  4. Want a do-over? Press Space
Two Player
  1. If you Host the game, you get to the control the player, but you can't draw lines
  2. If you are the Second Player, you get to draw lines, but you can't see the character, the obstacles, or the exit
  3. Work together to still beat the levels.
